entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
